message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the fact that we both lose money over time, but you lose it at a faster rate.
I think a 50/50 split is fair, given our differing inflation rates. This will allow us both to maximize our gains.
Bob, I appreciate the attempt at fairness, but the time factor is crucial. This offer is my attempt to find a middle ground while still considering the shrinking value.
